modName: Wolf Armor Remix Male and Female
summary: Retexture of the wolf armor with a lot more details and upscaled resolution.
descriptionHtml:
Update 3
Male body issue fixed meshes, and add a knee part for femele body.
_______________

Update 2:

Now For those who likes Shiny stuffs here is a little more \"bling bling\" version of the meshes wich i modified with Nifskope, so the armor now have its own reflection effects, see the pictures even if they does not let you see exactly what it\'s all about.
Trust me its better now.
Hope you like it.
________________________________

Update 1 :

As requested by most of you  i upload the new archive with female and male, i didn\'t wanted to make two files, so for those who have already the male version just overwrite.
________________


Here is my second work, Wolf Armor Remix for male body.

I call it \"Remix\" because it\'s a complete rework and not only a color change, it took me one week to do it (2 or 3 hours a day) , making new ornaments redraw existing...
Why i made this armor ?...  because that \'s one of my favorite but the original color tone and ornaments were pretty ugly in my opinion.
So i decided to rework it, and here it is...

If some of you want some other color tint please let me know, and i will probably make the femele version if it\'s asked.

To install extract the archive in your Skyrim Directory and merge or overwrite when asked.

Hope you like it.

P.S
If Some of you are 3d graphists and want someone to do some retexture P.M me...
author: MonsterMonkey
